actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to allow an additional income exemption for a taxpayer or his spouse who is deaf or deaf-blind.

summary.text: Allows an additional income exemption under the Internal Revenue Code for a taxpayer or his spouse who is deaf or deafblind (presently only blind). Defines "deafness" and "deaf-blind" for purposes of this Act. (Amends 26 U.S.C. 151 (d)). Allows an additional income tax exemption under the Internal Revenue Code for a taxpayer or his spouse who is deaf or deaf-blind (presently only blind). Defines "deafness" and "deaf-blind" for purposes of this Act. (Amends 26 U.S.C. 151 (d)).

titles.title: A bill to allow an additional income exemption for a taxpayer or his spouse who is deaf or deaf-blind.
